title: Enthralling Emerald & Ruby Diamond Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
G Color). Features a central Emerald cabochon
and lustrous South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish provides an unmatched sheen and durability.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a floral motif design throughout, meticulously crafted with pavé-set diamonds. The center pendant is adorned with a vibrant emerald, while a ruby pendant dangles beneath, adding a touch of regal charm. Delicate pearl drops enhance the necklace's grace and elegance. The floral design is inspired by traditional South Indian artistry.
colors: with a striking contrast from the Emerald (green) and Ruby (red). The pearl drops add a soft
occasions: and half-saree functions (లంగా ఓని). Also suitable for high-end parties and cultural events.
description: A timeless blend of tradition and modernity, this Haaram is a true heirloom piece. The exceptional diamond quality and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting brilliance and value. The contrasting emerald and ruby create a captivating visual appeal, making it a statement piece that exudes sophistication and elegance. A quintessential South Indian design, it's perfect for celebrating heritage and creating unforgettable memories.
